snippet: After an uproar over a bishop’s lavish new $42 million residence, more than 178,000 Germans left the church in 2013, the German Bishops’ Conference said.
abstract: German Bishops' Conference says number of Germans leaving the Roman Catholic Church increased sharply in 2013.
lead_paragraph: After an uproar over a bishop’s lavish new $42 million residence, more than 178,000 Germans left the church in 2013, the German Bishops’ Conference said.

headline.main: Germany: An Unusually Large Exodus From the Roman Catholic Church
headline.print_headline: Germany: An Unusually Large Exodus From the Roman Catholic Church
